name: Super Mario Clicker (Beta)
description:
A recreation of my old Scratch game, "Mario Clicker 3.0." 

Earn points by hitting the blocks. Buying more blocks will help you earn points faster. See how high of a score you can get! 

I am working on this game for a YouTube video documenting the development. I am posting this here for feedback to use!

(Currently, this build has no audio and doesn't save!!!!!)
